about_the_game:
ConnVerse, connect all beautiful scenery and scenes in the world and universe, provide high-quality creation and immersive experience, create the next generation of immersive entertainment products! Players can build all kinds of high-quality real and virtual spaces together, so that people can enjoy the beautiful scenery, parties, entertainment with friends from all over the world without leaving home, and experience tens of thousands of high-quality immersive spaces.


-ConnVerse is free of charge and can be used across platforms on VR glasses, computers, mobile phones and other devices.
-Use the creator's SDK to create a variety of favorite high-quality spaces and avatars
-Discover all kinds of interesting spaces, experience the beauty of the world and all kinds of amazing spaces

Join our fast-growing community, and let's create and explore the next generation of 3D Internet!

Contact us: support@connverse.cn

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Monterey
  • Processor: i5 4 core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5300M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Monterey or higher
  • Processor: i7 6 core or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5500M or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5 4 core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB / AMD RX 480
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, only the keyboard and mouse can be used in VR. Tracked Motion Controllers‘s Support is not complete.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: i7 6 core or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 2060 / AMD RX 5600 XT or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, only the keyboard and mouse can be used in VR. Tracked Motion Controllers‘s Support is not complete.
